author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Infrastructure is an issue that every large project is going to be and when your provider and sponsor shuts down you're going to be in for a bit of pain like has been recently seen with Equnix Metal shutting down and causing problems for Freedesktop and Alpine Linux
